definition: to slip away/to escape in stealth/to skate
ice/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/to chill sth/(of an object or substance) to feel cold/(of a person) cold/unfriendly/(slang) methamphetamine

sentences.english: I am as awkward as a cow on skates.
sentences.chinese: 我笨得像一頭穿着溜冰鞋的牛。

sentences.english: You can rent roller skates at the skating arena .
sentences.chinese: 在溜冰場你能夠租到溜冰鞋。

sentences.english: We wear shoes when we skate.
sentences.chinese: 當我們滑冰時，我們穿着溜冰鞋。

sentences.english: My skates hang sadly in the wardrobe .
sentences.chinese: 我的溜冰鞋悲慼地掛在衣櫥裏。

sentences.english: First you should step by step build up your confidence with the ice skates on.
sentences.chinese: 首先你要逐漸建立起穿上溜冰鞋的信心。

sentences.english: Today, roller skating is easy and fun.
sentences.chinese: 現在，穿四輪溜冰鞋滑冰，既容易又好玩。

sentences.english: May I borrow your roller skates ?
sentences.chinese: 我可以借你的滾軸溜冰鞋嗎？

sentences.english: When did you get your first pair of skates?
sentences.chinese: 你是什麼時候擁有第一雙溜冰鞋的？

sentences.english: Kinda like ants on roller skates … in a conga line.
sentences.chinese: 有點像扭動前行的螞蟻隊伍，也有點像滾軸溜冰鞋。

sentences.english: And for sport, like these ancient skates.
sentences.chinese: 還有運動時穿的，像這種古時的溜冰鞋。

sentences.english: The waiters wear roller skates to serve the food.
sentences.chinese: 那裏的服務員是穿着溜冰鞋上菜的。

sentences.english: Page often scoots around on Rollerblades or rides a bike.
sentences.chinese: Page常常踏着溜冰鞋或等着自行車繞來繞去。

sentences.english: The invention is mainly used for manufacturing high-elastic skate wheels or skateboard wheels.
sentences.chinese: 本發明主要用於高彈溜冰鞋輪或活力滑板輪的製作。

sentences.english: She is raring to try out her new skates.
sentences.chinese: 她很想試試她那雙新溜冰鞋。
魔法溜冰鞋，帶我一起離開。

definition: Heelys (roller shoes with wheels protruding slightly from the heel)
